s1.title: Simple, simple, simple
s1.p: The one feature that Tweety has as opposed to related avalon projects is that it is simple, simple, simple. Following the getting started document should get you running tweety in about 2 minutes, and developing components in 10.

s2.title: Egg
s2.p: Tweety is small and easy, but it can be made easier still.
For real starters there is Egg, that introduces you to the Lifecycle concept. Once you understand it hatch, it's time to Chirp!

s2.title: Tweety
s2.p: Then Tweety awaits you, and introduces the concept of a Container.
It can't be simpler, one concept at a time!
